text: Hi All, can anyone help me with how do I manage a bunch of CTA's in one folder and i want multiple folders like this folder?

HEY EVERYONE!  Who here is using <https://clarity.microsoft.com/|Microsoft Clarity>? You have any insights or takeaways, cool things we need to check out? I’ve got it set up on three sites now and I feel like I’m ready to dump my hotjar and lucky orange subscriptions!

I have not figured out how to do that but would LOVE to.

I need to have a different “default” value on each form instance — so I’m using the form api to just duplicate the form at this point and set the default data…. Wish I had a better answer

when you state “clicked all the checkboxes provided” that means you have every available permission checked?

Are you doing this in your regular portal or a dev portal?

Can you share your code where you are getting this error?
This solution should be pinned here and included in the “Common Issues” section for the HubSpot VSCode extension. Thank you for the help!
